UUID.title: Subject UUID
UUID.description: Subject unique identifier ID. Generated by the repository, not user input

group.title: Subject Group
group.description: Study group that this subject belongs to (control, experimental, healthy, etc.)

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: Additional subject information or link to psychological/physiological evaluations, etc.

channelLocations.title: Channel Locations
channelLocations.description: Link to subject electrode location file in any format

label.title: Subject ID
label.description: User-generated label for this Subject object.
